name: Small Talk (ZephyrRaine)
description:
Quick prototype for GMTK Jam... Everyone is a NPC and talking to them is the main mechanic of the game... Sorry there's no ending but when the text at the bottom left is 7/7 you're all good and can properly hit Alt+F4.

Thanks to Luka Buntić for some delicious lines of text! <3

Gamepad controller recommended!

Controls:

Jumpjumpjump - Y (Space)

Talk - A (Left mouse)

Switch - B (Right mouse)

Make choices - Right joystick (Up and Down arrows)

Move - Left joystick (WASD/ZQSD/Arrow Keys)

Move camera - Right joystick (Mouse)
